description: Scoop way more than just ice cream! Made of sturdy, sleek stainless steel, this versatile ice cream scoop is built to last. Its large 2-5/8" head holds 4 fl. oz., so it's great for forming even portions of a variety of items. Whether you're creating consistent, perfectly uniform balls of cookie dough, forming meatballs, or filling your bowl with balls of ice cream, this scoop will bring ease to your kitchen. It conveniently features a spring action for easy release and can be used both left-handed and right-handed! Put an end to differently sized, uneven cookies, and bring some consistency into your life.
